info.title: LeafLink Marketplace V2 API - Customers Core
info.description:
Customer management operations

# Introduction
## HTTP Request Notes
All endpoints covered in this document are preceded by `https://{{domain}}/api/v2/` unless otherwise noted.

Available domains

- `app.leaflink.com` - production environment

- `www.sandbox.leaflink.com` - sandbox environment

- `www.leaflink-integrations.leaflink.com` - integrations sandbox environment

[Learn more about sandbox environments](https://developer.leaflink.com/brands/api/authorization/#sandbox-environments)


Request paths must end in a slash character ('/'). Those that do not will return a 400 (Bad Request) response.

## Dynamic Responses
Some of our API endpoints support dynamic responses. These
are responses that vary in content and/or object level payload size
according to request path or query parameters.

Available parameters are listed beneath endpoint definitions.

get.description: List all `CompanyCustomerStatus` objects available for use.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this company customer status.

patch.description: Update an existing customer status by ID.

delete.description: Delete a customer status by ID.

get.description: List all `CompanyCustomerTier` objects available for use.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this company customer tier.

get.description: List customers for all active companies where the user is a member of.

parameters.name: fields_include
parameters.description: Include only specific fields in the response, separated by commas.

parameters.name: fields_exclude
parameters.description: Exclude specific fields in the response, separated by commas.

parameters.name: include_children
parameters.description: Include additional fields in the response. Available values include `tags`, `service_zone`, `managers`, `contacts`, and `license_type`

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: Filter by the customer's business phone number.

parameters.name: owner__slug
parameters.description: Filter by the slug of the Company that owns this Customer record.

parameters.name: company_slug
parameters.description: Filter by the slug of the Company that owns this Customer record.

parameters.name: external_id
parameters.description: Filter by the customer's external id.

parameters.name: old_license_number
parameters.description: Filter by the customer's previous license number.

parameters.name: modified__lt
parameters.description: Filter by the datetime the object was last modified, less than.

parameters.name: modified__lte
parameters.description: Filter by the datetime the object was last modified, less than or equal to.

parameters.name: modified__gt
parameters.description: Filter by the datetime the object was last modified, greater than.

parameters.name: modified__gte
parameters.description: Filter by the datetime the object was last modified, greater than or equal to.

parameters.name: brand
parameters.description: Filter by the customer's associated brand.

parameters.name: created_on__lt
parameters.description: Filter by created_on datetime, less than.

parameters.name: created_on__lte
parameters.description: Filter by created_on datetime, less than or equal to.

parameters.name: created_on__gt
parameters.description: Filter by created_on datetime, greater than.

parameters.name: created_on__gte
parameters.description: Filter by created_on datetime, greater than or equal to.

parameters.name: business_license_name
parameters.description: Filter by the customer's business license name.

parameters.name: business_identifier
parameters.description: Filter by the customer's business identifier.

parameters.name: license_number
parameters.description: Filter by the customer's license number.

parameters.name: ext_acct_id
parameters.description: Filter by the customer's external account id.

parameters.name: tier
parameters.description: Filter by the ID of a customer's tier.

parameters.name: price_schedule
parameters.description: Filter by the ID of a customer's price schedule.

parameters.name: service_zone
parameters.description: Filter by the ID of a customer's service zone.

parameters.name: license_type
parameters.description: Filter by the ID of a customer's license type.

parameters.name: license_inactive
parameters.description: Filter by the whether a customer's license is active.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by the ID of a customer's status.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Filter by the ID of a customer's state.

parameters.name: leaflink_source
parameters.description: Filter by whether the customer was added by LeafLink.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Filter by whether the customer has been archived.

parameters.name: delinquent
parameters.description: Filter by whether the customer is delinquent.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: external_id_key
parameters.description: Filter for orders that match external_ids key:values.  Must be used with external_id_values.

parameters.name: external_id_values
parameters.description: Filter for orders that match external_ids key:values.  Multiple values separated by a comma.  Must be used with external_id_key.

parameters.name: fields_include
parameters.description: Include only specific fields in the response, separated by commas.

parameters.name: fields_exclude
parameters.description: Exclude specific fields in the response, separated by commas.

parameters.name: include_children
parameters.description: Include additional fields in the response. Available values include `tags`, `service_zone`, `managers`, `contacts`, and `license_type`

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this company customer.

owner.title: Company
owner.description: The Company that created the custom status.

is_stock.title: Is a LeafLink Stock Status
is_stock.description: Is this a stock LeafLink status?

managers.description: Ids for the sales reps assigned to this customer.

created_on.description: Date and time the customer was created.

modified.description: Date and time the customer was last modified.

next_contact_date.description: Date for the next contact, YYYY-MM-DD

external_id.description: Id of the customer in a 3rd party system

ext_acct_id.description: Id of the customer in QuickBooks Online.

old_license_number.description: Old license number for the customer

license_inactive.description: Is the license inactive for this customer?

business_identifier.description: Company identifier distinct from license numbers

ein.description: Company's federal EIN number. For Customers linked to LeafLink Buyers (partner_id=Company.id), this field is read-only and inherited directly from the linked LeafLink Buyer Company. For Customers not linked to LeafLink Buyer Companies (partner_id=null), this field will return null.

delivery_preferences.description: Customer delivery preferences. These will show up as footnotes on orders placed by the customer.

brand.description: Brand name associated with the customer

leaflink_last_views.description: The last time this customer viewed your products.

leaflink_source.description: Was this customer added to your CRM by LeafLink?

delinquent.description: Is this customer delinquent on billing?

discount_percent.description: Discount percent for orders from this customer.
